CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: RiverNorth Opportunistic Municipal Income Fund, Inc. Common Stock

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 325 NORTH LASALLE STREET SUITE 645 SUITE 1420, CHICAGO, Florida, 60654, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Fund will seek to achieve its investment objectives by investing, directly or indirectly, at least 80% of its Managed Assets in municipal bonds, the interest on which is, in the opinion of bond counsel to the issuers, generally excludable from gross income for regular U. Under normal market conditions, the Fund seeks to achieve its investment objectives by investing, directly or indirectly, at least 80% of its Managed Assets (as defined below) in municipal bonds, the interest on which is, in the opinion of bond counsel to the issuers, generally excludable from gross income for regular U.S. federal income tax purposes, except that the interest may be includable in taxable income for purposes of the Federal alternative minimum tax (Municipal Bonds). In order to qualify to pay exempt-interest dividends, which are items of interest excludable from gross income for federal income tax purposes, the Fund seeks to invest at least 50% of its Managed Assets directly in such Municipal Bonds.
